LockOnScreenCoveragePercentageY.Description: What percentage the lockon reticle uses of the screen, based on the height of the window

LockOnMaximumRange.Description: Range in CM, within this distance from a pod, you can lock on to the survivor

LockOnLingerTime.Description: Time in seconds which a lockon lingers before the lock on progress resets

LockOnTeleportTime.Description: Time in seconds which it takes to lock-on and teleport

LockOnAssimilationTime.Description: Time in seconds which it takes to lock-on and assimilate

LockOnCooldownTime.Description: Time in seconds after teleporting to or assimilating a survivor before we can do one of these again

LockOnAntiCampLockOnRateMultiplier.Description: Multiplier of the rate at which the killer locks on while the target is within an anticamp zone

LockOnWakeupTime.Description: Time in seconds it takes for the killer to get back from the killer pod to the killer itself

LockOnWakeupTimeAntiCampMultiplier.Description: Multiplier for the time in seconds it takes for the killer to get back from the killer pod to the killer itself within the anti camp zone

LockOnAutoDetectRange.Description: A survivor within this range of a killer pod will be locked onto with priority

ItemBoxInProgressDuration.Description: Base time an ItemBox will remain in the 'InProgress' state

ItemBoxSpeedUpInteractionProgressMultipl.Description: How much faster a chest progresses when InProgress and being interacted with

InitialNumberOfInProgressItemBoxes.Description: How many item boxes will begin as InProgess in a match

ItemBoxDistanceToShowOutline.Description: How near a survivor must be to see the outline of an Available or InProgress ItemBox

IsItemBoxOutlineVisibleToSurvivorsWithEm.Description: Whether or not survivors holding an Emp can see the outline of an Available or InProgress item box (1 = true, 0 = false)

EmpAmmoCount.Description: How many times an Emp can be used before it is consumed

EmpInteractionSecondsToCharge.Description: How long is takes to prime the Emp

EmpInteractionZoomPercentage.Description: Multiplier applied to default strafe offset when using the Emp (0 is no zoom, 1 is default)

AssimilationCooldownTime.Description: Time in seconds that a survivor cannot be assimilated after having their assimilation removed by an Emp

PodDisableTime.Description: Time in seconds a killer pod will be disabled for after being hit with an EMP while being controlled by the killer

LastControlledPodLingerTime.Description: Time in seconds that the aura of the pod will by displayed yellow when being exit

MaxKillerPodAmmo.Description: Maximum amount of killer pods that can be active at once

PodRemovalRange.Description: Range in CM, a pod within this range is considered to be removed when aiming at it

PodSpawningRange.Description: Range in CM, maximum distance at which you can spawn a pod

PodSpawningMaximumHeightDifference.Description: Distance in CM, pods can not be spawned higher than this difference from the killer

PodSurfaceDistance.Description: Distance in CM, pods are this far away from the surface the are spawned on

PodInteractableRestrictionRange.Description: Range in CM, can not spawn pods within this range of an interactable (that is not a collectable)

PodSpawningAllowedDegreesMinimum.Description: Lowest degrees from horizontal at which the pods are allowed to be spawned

PodSpawningAllowedDegreesMaximum.Description: Highest degrees from horizontal at which the pods are allowed to be spawned

PodSpawningMinimumRange.Description: Range in CM, if the range between the killer and the surface is smaller, you can not spawn a pod on this surface

PodSpawningRequiredAttachmentPoints.Description: Must have at least this many tentacles before it can be spawned in this location

PodSpawningDistanceBetweenPodsWithLineOf.Description: Distance in CM, a pod can not be spawned within this distance if another pod has line of sight to it

PodDestructionDelayTime.Description: The delay in seconds between pods being destroyed from one use of the Emp

PodAttachmentPointRays.Description: Do not tweak - Squared for grid

PodSpawningInvalidShowDelay.Description: Time in seconds when the pod spawning becomes invalid that we stick to the previous valid option

KillerPodViewPitchMinimum.Description: Maximum amount of degrees a killer pod can rotate its view upwards

KillerPodViewPitchMaximum.Description: Maximum amount of degrees a killer pod can rotate its view downwards

TeleportDuration.Description: Time in seconds for the duration of the teleport

KillerPodSpawningChargeTime.Description: Time in seconds to charge the interaction to spawn killer pods

KillerPodSpawningReloadTime.Description: Time in seconds between each killer projectile shot to spawn killer pods

MinPodsRemovedForManyPodsRemovedScoreEve.Description: How many pods need to be removed by the Emp at once to qualify for the 'many pods removed' score event

MinUnhookedSurvivorAssimilationsRemovedF.Description: How many unhooked survivors need to have their assimilation removed by the Emp at once to qualify for the related score event

MinHookedSurvivorAssimilationsRemovedFor.Description: How many hooked survivors need to have their assimilation removed by the Emp at once to qualify for the related score event

MaxTrackedTimeSinceTeleportToSurvivor.Description: The amount of time after the killer teleports to a survivor for which the eleport strike / teleport evade events can occur

CrossSurvivorAssimilationDelay.Description: Delay before cross survivor assimilation goes off while in range

OverclockDuration.Description: Time in seconds for the overclock status effect to last after teleporting
